description: This delightful combination was a result of having enough leftover uncooked cod, aioli and cooked shelled favas for one person (me) the day after I’d made a fish soup for a dinner party Now I think I might serve the improvised dish at my next dinner party.
title: Steamed Cod With Favas and Aioli
title_page: Steamed Cod With Favas and Aioli Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This delightful combination was a result of having enough leftover uncooked cod, aioli and cooked shelled favas for one person (me) the day after I’d made a fish soup for a dinner party. Now I think I might serve the improvised dish at my next dinner party.
Featured in: Summer Aioli Feasts.
